title: The Garden of Eve
description:
Evie doesn't believe in magic anymore.
After all, if magic were real, her mom would still be alive.But when Evie moves to Beaumont, New York, where her father has bought a withered apple orchard that the townspeople whisper is cursed, she learns about a lost girl, receives a mysterious seed, and meets a boy who claims to be dead.Before long, Evie finds herself in the middle of a fairy tale. And this one is real.
author: K.L. Going
